Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25051 affecting package aspell for versions less than 0.60.8-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-25051 affecting package aspell for versions less than 0.60.8-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package aspell is earlier than 0.60.8-7, affected by CVE-2019-25051
